flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: WALREIN’s two massively developedntusks can totally shatter blocks ofnice weighing ten tons with one blow.fThis POKéMON’s thick coat of blubberninsulates it from subzero temperatures.
WALREIN swims all over in frigidnseawater while crushing icebergs withnits grand, imposing tusks.fIts thick layer of blubber makes enemynattacks bounce off harmlessly.
To protect its herd, the leader battlesnanything that invades its territory, evennat the cost of its life. Its tusks may snapnoff in battle.
It swims through icy seas while shatteringnice floes with its large tusks. It isnprotected by its thick blubber.
It swims through icy seas while shatteringnice floes with its large tusks. It isnprotected by its thick blubber.
It shatters ice with its big tusks.nIts thick blubber repels not onlynthe cold, but also enemy attacks.
It shatters ice with its big tusks.nIts thick blubber repels not onlynthe cold, but also enemy attacks.
It shatters ice with its big tusks.nIts thick blubber repels not onlynthe cold, but also enemy attacks.
It shatters drift ice with itsnstrong tusks. Its thick layer ofnblubber repels enemy attacks.
It shatters drift ice with itsnstrong tusks. Its thick layer ofnblubber repels enemy attacks.
Il brise la glace avec ses grossesndéfenses. Sa graisse le protège dunfroid, mais aussi des attaques.
It shatters ice with its big tusks.nIts thick blubber repels not onlynthe cold, but also enemy attacks.
Il brise la glace avec ses grossesndéfenses. Sa graisse le protège dunfroid, mais aussi des attaques.
It shatters ice with its big tusks.nIts thick blubber repels not onlynthe cold, but also enemy attacks.
Not only does its thick blubber keep itnwarm, it also protects it from attacks.nIt shatters ice with its prized tusks.
Not only does its thick blubber keep itnwarm, it also protects it from attacks.nIt shatters ice with its prized tusks.
おおきな　こおりを　キバで　くだく。nあつい　しぼうは　さむさだけでなくnてきの　こうげきも　はねかえす。
큰 얼음을 이빨로 부순다.n두꺼운 지방은 추위뿐만 아니라n상대의 공격도 이겨낸다.
Il brise la glace avec ses grosses défenses.nSa graisse le protège du froid, mais aussi desnattaques.
Mit seinen Stoßzähnen bricht es durch Eis.nEine Speckschicht schützt es vor Kälte und Angriffen.
Rompe el hielo con sus colmillos. Su gruesa capa dengrasa le protege del frío y de los enemigos.
Frantuma il ghiaccio con le zanne. Lo spesso stratonadiposo respinge il freddo e gli attacchi nemici.
It shatters ice with its big tusks. Its thick blubbernrepels not only the cold, but also enemy attacks.
大きな　氷を　キバで　砕く。n厚い　脂肪は　寒さだけでなくn敵の　攻撃も　はね返す。
たくましい　キバで　りゅうひょうをnふんさいする。ぶあつい　しぼうがnてきの　こうげきを　はねかえす。
믿음직한 송곳니로 유빙을n부스러뜨린다. 두꺼운 지방으로n적의 공격을 이겨낸다.
Ses robustes défenses pulvérisent la glace, et sonnépaisse couche de graisse repousse les attaques.
Seine kräftigen Stoßzähne können Eisschollennzerschmettern. Sein dicker Speck wehrt Angriffe ab.
Sus fuertes colmillos destrozan los témpanos de hielo.nSu capa de grasa lo protege de sus enemigos.
Frantuma il ghiaccio con le potenti zanne. Il suonspesso strato adiposo respinge gli attacchi nemici.
It shatters drift ice with its strong tusks. Its thicknlayer of blubber repels enemy attacks.
たくましい　キバで　流氷をn粉砕する。分厚い　脂肪がn敵の　攻撃を　跳ね返す。
はったつした　２ほんの　キバは　１０トンも　あるnひょうざんを　いちげきで　ふんさいする。nしぼうが　ぶあつく　ひょうてんかでも　へいき。
발달한 2개의 이빨은 10톤이나 되는n빙산을 일격에 분쇄한다.n지방이 두꺼워서 영하의 기온에서도 끄떡없다.

Les deux énormes défenses de Kaimorse peuvent détruirenen un seul coup des blocs de glace de plus de 10 t.nL’épaisse couche de graisse de ce Pokémon l’isolenlorsque la température est en dessous de zéro.
Walraisa hat zwei massive Stoßzähne, die mit einem HiebnEisblöcke zertrümmern können, die bis zu 10 t wiegen.nEs besitzt eine dicke Speckschicht, die es vor eisigennTemperaturen schützt.

Walrein tiene unos exagerados colmillos con los que puedenhacer añicos bloques de hielo de hasta 10 toneladas de unansola dentellada. La gruesa capa de grasa que lo recubre lenprotege de temperaturas inferiores a 0 °C.

Le due zanne molto sviluppate di Walrein sono in gradondi ridurre in polvere blocchi di ghiaccio del peso din100 quintali. Lo spesso strato di grasso attorno al corponlo isola dalle rigide temperature polari.
Walrein’s two massively developed tusks can totally shatternblocks of ice weighing 10 tons with one blow. This Pokémon’snthick coat of blubber insulates it from subzero temperatures.
発達した　２本の　キバは　１０トンも　あるn氷山を　一撃で　粉砕する。n脂肪が　ぶ厚く　氷点下でも　平気。
おおきな　キバで　ひょうざんを　くだきながらnひょうてんかの　うみを　およぎまわる。nぶあつい　しぼうが　こうげきを　はねかえす。
큰 이빨로 빙산을 깨트리며n영하의 바다를 헤엄쳐 다닌다.n두꺼운 지방이 공격을 튕겨낸다.

Kaimorse nage dans l’eau glacée et détruit les icebergsnsur son passage à l’aide de ses grandes et impressionnantesndéfenses. Son épaisse couche de graisse lui permet de fairenrebondir les attaques ennemies.
Walraisa schwimmt in eiskaltem Meerwasser und zertrümmertnEisberge mit seinen beeindruckenden Stoßzähnen. Eine dickenSchicht aus Walfischspeck lässt gegnerische Attacken von ihmnabprallen.

Walrein va nadando por mares glaciales y destrozandonicebergs con los enormes e imponentes colmillos que tiene.nLa gruesa capa de grasa que tiene en el cuerpo hace que losnataques enemigos reboten y no le hagan ningún daño.
Walrein nuota in tutti i mari glaciali e frantuma gli iceberg connle sue enormi e potenti zanne. Lo spesso strato di grasso chenavvolge il suo corpo fa rimbalzare senza danno gli attacchinnemici.
Walrein swims all over in frigid seawater while crushingnicebergs with its grand, imposing tusks. Its thick layer ofnblubber makes enemy attacks bounce off harmlessly.
大きな　キバで　氷山を　砕きながらn氷点下の　海を　泳ぎ回る。nぶ厚い　脂肪が　攻撃を　跳ね返す。
